content.prompt: Which of the following is a limitation of using the excerpt to study the long-term influences on United States involvement overseas in the early 1900s?

choices.label: The speech was delivered by Roosevelt at a local state gathering
The speech was given during the period when this development occurred
The speech expressed support for westward expansion in North America
The speech expressed a desire to alter the cultures of American Indians

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
